data.message: I accidentally deleted the film and cannot figure out how to repost it? when I go to the page I only get 6 pictures, Can you post a way how to repost please? ~ @Facebook

replies.message: Thanks for the question, Schneice. We're sorry that you're having trouble with your Look Back video. We understand that this is an issue some of you are experiencing and our team is hard at work to resolve any problems. Thanks for your patience! -Natalie
Please let us know when you've resolved this.-Thanks.
Thank you FB for the video.  I love mine!  I have alos enjoyed the clips on my friend's page.  What a wonderful gift from you!
Will we be notified when our video is fixed?
thank you very much I will
I did the same thing! A friend told me I could edit the video but I had to delete it first. So I did and when i went to do a new video it only gave me 6 pictures.....very sad :(
Mine is not working, all i get is a thank you card. I want my movie please.Thank you! Answer me please!
And that is all we are going to get..I read something that some people will only get a THANK YOU...I only have 6 pics showing and a Thank You...
My video was accidentally deleted and I can not do it again.Could you help me please, I would get it back?
I KNOW it's sad :( I really liked mines
I too accidentally deleted mine while trying to modify it.. I want it back! and even better if it can be modified after
thank you so much for fixing this I love my video... FACEBOOK YOUR THE BEST <3<3
Thank you thank you thank you FB !  The videos you guys made for us is just plain AWESOME !
Can someone tell me how to get my FB language back to English from whatever is on my page now?  This is driving me insane!
I accidently deleted mine when editing it. How do i get it back?
Mine too i accidentally deleted my movie and i really want to get it back... please help
i cant see lookback....i cant open the page..
